Articles.Content: 550 Radio communication is invented when Barely Kerman attached a phone on a metal pole.
552: Kerbals launch a geostationary communication sattelite so they can communicate with each other using their phone-on-metal-poles.
554: First GPS-navigated autopilot rocket, it went to an orbit around minmus, and sent a probe that landed on surface.

554.5: The samples from Minmus have been analysed and contain water. Kerbals start to piece together theories on how the planet Kerbin was created because of this. Also, Tonju Kerman suggest that everything orbits around Kerbin. His idea was influenced by the moons that had orbited Kerbin for millions of years.
555: Most of people don't like theory of Tonju Kerman, and some very helicentic-fanatic guy kills him. First death for your own theories.
Tonju Kerman's followers blame Jebidiah's religion for Tonju Kerman's death. Neither side trusts each other and soon things escalate in to the first Holy War Of The Kerbals.
557: HWOTK starts to be really dangerous, when helicentrists develop an fission bomb,and geocentrists develop a fusion bomb.

559: After two years of tensions, HWOTK takes a sudden turn for the comical when both sides decide to try and build bomb-powered rockets. The stock of nuclear weapons is quickly used up, with the only casualties being a few unlucky test pilots.
559-1/2 Hwotk escalates as Kerbals invent larger fireworks, which explode on impact. They contemplate stapping aforementioned nuclear weapons onto the front.

559.75: The HWOTK's largest battle takes place. The Battle For Eastern Kurope. The Tonju Supporters Militia (TTSM) have greater numbers than the opposition but they are facing better equipped Nationalist Forces (NF). TTSM are being commanded by Monju Kerman, Tonju Kerman's brother. NF are being commanded by Jebediah Kerman himself.

Edited January 26, 2014 by victory143

567

6 years after the end of HOWTK

the start of the Kulf war when the United states of Kemeraca go up against Kiraqu

Woah! Nobody decided who won the battle for Eastern Kurope? This battle changes kerbal history forever! Commander jebediah, please read. You even got Holy War Of The Kerbals wrong! HWOTK.

Edited January 26, 2014 by victory143

56.999

This ship arrives in the Kerbin system and wipes out the history from the Battle of Eastern Kurope to New Year's day in 567. As such, the Kulf war between the USK and Kiraqu happens instead of the "real" history.
Lord potato, you arrived 50 years before Kerbals existed

(sorry for posting two dates)I think i am going to say something about HWOTK:

559: End of that big battle, NF wins, but at what cost... they lost 95% of they army.

560: Not so big, but most civilian-killing battle takes place. 50 million Kerbals die. Newest Deuterio-tritium fussion bombs are used by NHC (National Helicentrists), and TGC (Tonju's Geocentrists), a poor country Koland is cut in half, and one side belongs to NHC, and the other to TGC.

(also sorry for alot of statements.)
And now i also see thet some arguments will probably go, because of HWOTK. HWOTK kills, poisons and separtes human hearts.
Are we continuing from HWOTK?
I DON'T KNOW! Anything... I.. I.. ugh.

592: After over a decade of confusion, the Kerbals finally piece together who won the Holy War of the Kerbals. It was... aliens.

In response, they develop a hyper-advanced star cruiser to track down the aliens' home planet, but the crew are killed and eaten by scorpions, delaying further aerospace innovation for several years thereafter.

Ok... 600: Kerbal's discover a new virus which transforms a Kerbal to a zombie-like state. The infected are called 'Zombals'. The virus originated in Eastern Kurope after the biological warfare that had took place there 40 years before.
610: The Zombals have spread to the Krussian Kingdom to the east and the Krussian millitary attempts to hold them off.
Year 365 kerbals make first attempts to get into space be strapping large amounts of fireworks to themselves

Year 365???? Ftw?

anyways:

615: Kerbal doctors start to develop cure for Zombal Illness.

Edited January 29, 2014 by cziken20
Year 615 & 1/2, the develop the cure. They then begin to continue their former aerospace research, mainly involving an unfortunate incident with a go-cart and some solid rockets.

Year 616: Due to requests by Kerbal go-cart drivers to have something flapping in the wind to give them a sense of "speed", Kerbal engineers put their heads together and spend millions of dollars researching new technologies, finally culminating in the invention of the flag.
